00053   GaussianDistribution(const size_t dimension) :
00054       mean(dimension), covariance(arma::eye<arma::mat>(dimension, dimension))

00062 
00064   size_t Dimensionality() const { return mean.n_elem; }
00065

00070   {
00071     return mlpack::gmm::phi(observation, mean, covariance);
